A 48 Hours Mystery Double Feature
Saturday, May 26, beginning at 
      9 p.m. ET/PT
 
9 p.m.: A Shot In The 
      Dark
Susan Spencer reports on the 
      mysterious murder of a prominent heart surgeon's wife, killed by a single 
      bullet.
 
10 p.m.: Secrets & Lies On 
      Grapevine
Lake
Troy Roberts reports on the 
      April 2002 murder of successful real estate agent David Nixon of 
      Grapevine, Texas. His body was discovered burning in a storm drain. Was 
      murder the payback for a man who lived life on the 
      edge?
